text:
Tests currently expect that no response body is returned.  Specification states
that the request is not delivered to the target page.  Nothing in the spec
disallows a container implemenation from sending a vendor specific message
concerning the success or failure of the pre compilation request.

Tests should instead validate that a certain string is not returned in the
response (this string would only be returned if the request was delivered to the
target JSP).
creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
